Adversary.definition: one that contends with or opposes another ;esp

1.1: one that contends with or opposes another

2.1: any of the opposing parties in a legal action

3.1: of, relating to, or involving opposing parties or interests

4.1: of, relating to, or involving a system of justice in which opposing parties usually represented by counsel present evidence to an impartial decision-maker (as a jury) by a process of questioning witnesses under the supervision of a judge compare
